snippet: President Obama appears to have gained ground in the closing days of the race: among 12 national polls published on Monday, he led Mitt Romney by an average of 1.6 percentage points.
abstract: President Obama appears to have gained ground in the closing days of the race: among 12 national polls published on Monday, he led Mitt Romney by an average of 1.6 percentage points.

headline.main: Nov. 5: Late Poll Gains for Obama Leave Romney With Longer Odds
